description: This template will build a minimally configured OpenShift 4.20 cluster.

parameters.description: The pull secret contains credentials for authenticating to image repositories.
parameters.name: pull_secret

parameters.description: A public ssh key that will be installed into the `authorized_keys` file of the `core` user on cluster worker nodes.
parameters.name: ssh_public_key

title: Simple OpenShift 4.20 Cluster
